pr_title: DB-9745: add version number to dictionary tables

timeline.message: DB-9745: add version number to dictionary tables

timeline.bodyText: maybe add a justification for suppressing this warning
timeline.author: hatyo

replies.bodyText: It turned out this is not needed
replies.author: jyuanca

timeline.bodyText: Could use a not-null assertion here.
timeline.author: hatyo

replies.bodyText: It would be verbose to assert all set methods
replies.author: jyuanca

timeline.bodyText: I would use a Map<Name, String> where Name is an Enumeration of catalog names (SYSCONGLOMERATES, SYSTABLES, SYSCOLUMNS, ...). This makes it easier to change and work with IMHO.
timeline.author: hatyo
hatyo

timeline.bodyText: what's is SysIBMSchema and why do we search it if we can't find the table in the SystemSchema?
timeline.author: hatyo

replies.bodyText: SYSIBM schema is a legacy system schema inherited from Derby. It is not very useful, but for completeness, splice should also search for this schema, and populate TabInfoImpl for sysibm.sysdummy1 table.
replies.author: jyuanca

timeline.bodyText: hmm .. we always return an empty row here, why is that?
timeline.author: hatyo

timeline.bodyText: maybe you should again after exiting the while loop that the table is enabled (and throw exception if it is not), because wait could've reached 2000 retries and the loop exited however the table is still not enabled yet.
timeline.author: hatyo

timeline.bodyText: I would throw, this could be misleading for users.
timeline.author: hatyo
hatyo
hatyo
